title: Devsphere Forum
description: This is a modern forum web application built with the MERN stack. The client-side is developed using React with a focus on smooth user experience, role-based routing, and responsive design. It allows users to create posts, upvote/downvote, comment, and subscribe for membership. Admins can manage users, posts, and monitor abuse reports. Integrated Stripe payments unlock premium membership features. JWT cookie authentication ensures secure login and protected routes.
features: JWT token-based authentication with cookie support
Login with Google for quick access
Create, Read, Update, and Delete forum posts
Limit of 5 posts for non-members, unlimited posting for members
Upvote and downvote system using React Query
User dashboard with profile and post list
Admin dashboard to manage users, posts, and roles
Role-based route protection (User/Admin)
403 Forbidden page for unauthorized access
Stripe payment integration for membership purchase
Comment system with abuse reporting
Admin can delete harmful comments and mark reports resolved
Responsive design using Tailwind CSS + DaisyUI
SweetAlert2 used for success and error dialogs
React-Select integration for enhanced tag selection

title: Next.js Multi-Layout App
description: This is a modern web application built with Next.js 15+ App Router. It features multiple layouts (Home layout with Navbar/Footer and Dashboard layout without Navbar/Footer), authentication using NextAuth.js, and a responsive design with Tailwind CSS. The project demonstrates best practices for route-based layouts, protected routes, and modular architecture. Users can explore a public landing page and about page, while authenticated users can access a secure dashboard and add products.
features: Multiple layout support with App Router
Home layout includes Navbar and Footer
Dashboard layout is minimal without Navbar/Footer
Authentication implemented with NextAuth.js
Protected routes for authenticated users only
Public pages: Home and About
Dashboard pages: Dashboard overview, Add Product form
Responsive design styled with Tailwind CSS
Clean and organized folder structure

title: Event Management
description: EventMatea is a modern event management platform where users can discover, join, and manage events. It features dark mode, authentication, animated UI, and real-time filtering to create a dynamic and engaging experience.
features: Full CRUD operations for parcel management

title: Plant-Care-Tracker
description: This project uses react-helmet-async to dynamically manage page titles and metadata based on the active route. It enhances SEO, improves accessibility, and gives each page a unique context. Custom titles are set per route to help search engines and users better understand the page content. The TopPlantCareMistakes component highlights the top 5 most common indoor plant care mistakes. It is visually styled using Tailwind CSS and includes warning icons from react-icons to alert users. The layout features a light green background, rounded corners, and shadow effects for a clean, modern appearance. The SeasonalPlantCareTips component provides specific plant care tips for Spring, Summer, Autumn, and Winter. It uses react-icons to represent each season visually and Tailwind CSS for a responsive, centered layout. This helps users adjust their plant care routine throughout the year in an intuitive and engaging way.
features: Dynamic page titles and metadata management using react-helmet-async
Create: Add new plants with custom names, types, and care instructions
Read: View detailed plant profiles and seasonal care tips
Update: Edit plant information and update care schedules
Delete: Remove plants from your collection with confirmation prompts
Top 5 plant care warnings highlighted with intuitive icons
Seasonal plant care tips for Spring, Summer, Autumn, and Winter
Clean and modern UI styled with Tailwind CSS
Visual alerts using react-icons for better user guidance
Fully responsive design supporting mobile, tablet, and desktop

title: JobTrack
description: Job Track is an innovative and user-friendly web application designed to help job seekers explore a wide variety of job opportunities across multiple companies. This single-page application centralizes listings from multiple organizations, allowing users to view job descriptions, criteria, and apply directly through company websites. It offers a clean, winter-themed design focused on regional support and usability.
features: JWT-based secure authentication with HTTP-only cookies
Credentialed CORS setup for cross-origin access
MongoDB Server API integration
Login & logout via JWT tokens
Secure/SameSite cookie handling
Dynamic company job listings from JSON
Job description modals with direct apply links
Responsive design for all screen sizes
Navigation using React Router
Dynamic page titles via react-helmet-async
Routes for Forgot Password and Profile Update
Winter-themed user interface
Custom 404 error page

title: PathoWay
description: Pathoway is a modern parcel delivery platform where users can effortlessly send parcels by filling out sender and receiver forms. It features real-time tracking, rider management, and secure online payments.
features: Full CRUD operations for parcel management
Stripe Payment Integration with secure transaction logging
Track parcels using tracking ID
Payment status updates with date logging
